name: Nøgne Ø Imperial Brown Ale
description: There is a long story to this malty ale.  It was first brewed in the spring 2006 in Nørrebro Bryghus in Copenhagen, Denmark, as a joint brew between Nøgne Ø and Nørrebro.  Nørrebro calls their version “Double Knot Brown”.  It is the perfect thing to drink with almost any cheese.
